00051 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_INCL_FASTFORMAT_HPP_INITIALISER
00052 #define FASTFORMAT_INCL_FASTFORMAT_HPP_INITIALISER
00053 
00054 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00055  * Feature discrimination
00056  */
00057 
00058 /* Which diagnostic output to use if initialisation fails */
00059 #if defined(PANTHEIOS_INCL_PANTHEIOS_H_PANTHEIOS)
00060 # define FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_PANTHEIOS
00061 #elif defined(WIN32) && \
00062       !defined(_CONSOLE)
00063 # define FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_WINDOWS_LOGGING
00064 #else /* ? Pantheios || Windows GUI || stderr */
00065 # define FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_STDERR
00066 #endif /* Pantheios || Windows GUI || stderr */
00067 
00068 /* Whether the compiler supports Windows' Structure Exception Handling */
00069 #if defined(STLSOFT_CF_SUPPORTS_SEH)
00070 # define FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_USE_SEH
00071 #else
00072 # if defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_MSVC) || \
00073      (  defined(STLSOFT_COMPILER_IS_INTEL) && \
00074         defined(PLATFORMSTL_OS_IS_WINDOWS))
00075 #  define FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_USE_SEH
00076 # endif /* compiler / OS */
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00080  * Includes
00081  */
00082 
00083 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_INCL_FASTFORMAT_HPP_FASTFORMAT
00084 # error This file can only be included from within fastformat/fastformat.hpp
00085 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_INCL_FASTFORMAT_HPP_FASTFORMAT */
00086 
00087 
00088 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00089 } /* namespace fastformat */
00090 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00091 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_PANTHEIOS
00092  // Nothing to include
00093 #endif
00094 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_WINDOWS_LOGGING
00095  // fastformat_util_snprintf
00096 # include <fastformat/util/string/snprintf.h>
00097  // Include Windows header
00098 # include <windows.h>
00099 #endif
00100 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_STDERR
00101  // Include Streams header
00102 # include <stdio.h>
00103 #endif
00104 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00105 namespace fastformat
00106 {
00107 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00108 
00109 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00110  * Classes
00111  */
00112 
00143 class fastformat_initialiser
00144 {
00147 public:
00148     typedef fastformat_initialiser   class_type;
00150 
00153 public:
00157     fastformat_initialiser()
00158     {
00159         int r = fastformat_init();
00160 
00161         if(r < 0)
00162         {
00163             // TODO: use SEH to place exitProcess in finally
00164 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_USE_SEH
00165             __try
00166 #endif // FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_USE_SEH
00167             {
00168                 record_init_failure_(r);
00169             }
00170 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_USE_SEH
00171             __finally
00172 #endif // FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_USE_SEH
00173             {
00174                 fastformat_exitProcess(1);
00175             }
00176         }
00177     }
00181     ~fastformat_initialiser()
00182     {
00183         fastformat_uninit();
00184     }
00186 
00189 private:
00190 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_WINDOWS_LOGGING
00191     static void record_init_failure_Windows_GUI_(ff_char_t const* message)
00192     {
00193         // to debug stream
00194         ::OutputDebugString(message);
00195 
00196         // to event log
00197         //
00198         // NOTE: to have this displayed properly in the Windows Event Log,
00199         // users should download and install Pantheios.COM
00200         HANDLE h = ::RegisterEventSource(NULL, FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("logging-bailout"));
00201         if(NULL != h)
00202         {
00203             LPCTSTR strings[2] = { FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("process"), message };
00204             ::ReportEvent(h, EVENTLOG_ERROR_TYPE, 0, 1001, 0, 2, 0, strings, 0);
00205             ::DeregisterEventSource(h);
00206         }        
00207     }
00208 #endif // FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_WINDOWS_LOGGING
00209     static void record_init_failure_(int r)
00210     {
00211 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_PANTHEIOS
00212         {
00213             // Record initialisation failure to Pantheios logging API
00214             //
00215             // Assumes that FastFormat and Pantheios both use multi-byte
00216             // string build, or both use wide-string build
00217             ::pantheios::logprintf(PANTHEIOS_SEV_ALERT, PANTHEIOS_LITERAL_STRING("could not initialise the FastFormat library: %s"), fastformat_getInitCodeString(r));
00218         }
00219 #endif
00220 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_WINDOWS_LOGGING
00221         {
00222             // Record initialisation failure to Windows debugger
00223             //
00224             // Assumes that FastFormat and Windows API both use multi-byte
00225             // string build, or both use wide-string build
00226             ff_char_t   message[1024];
00227             int const   n = fastformat_util_snprintf(&message[0], (sizeof(message) / sizeof(message[0])) - 1, FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("could not initialise the FastFormat library: %s"), fastformat_getInitCodeString(r));
00228 
00229             if(n < 0)
00230             {
00231                 record_init_failure_Windows_GUI_(FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("could not initialise the FastFormat library: cause not indicated"));
00232             }
00233             else
00234             {
00235                 message[n + 0] = '\n';
00236                 message[n + 1] = '\0';
00237 
00238                 record_init_failure_Windows_GUI_(message);
00239             }
00240         }
00241 #endif
00242 #ifdef FASTFORMAT_INIT_FAILURE_REPORT_VIA_STDERR
00243         {
00244             // Record initialisation failure to stderr
00245 # ifdef FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00246             ::fwprintf(
00247 # else // ? FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00248             ::fprintf(
00249 # endif // FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00250                 stderr
00251             ,   FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("could not initialise the FastFormat library: %s\n")
00252             ,   fastformat_getInitCodeString(r)
00253             );
00254         }
00255 #endif
00256     }
00258 
00261 private:
00262     fastformat_initialiser(class_type const&);
00263     class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00265 };
00266 
00267 namespace
00268 {
00271     static fastformat_initialiser    s_fastformat_initialiser;
00272 
00273 } /* anonymous namespace */
00274
